property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: ''In this land, only eyes blinded by darkness can see the way...''

properties.property: At times, you see it flickering. The light only you can see. By second nature, you reach out, and...

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

properties.property:
'''Full health:''' You bathed your body in the light. A power shines within you, breaking through the darkness. Any pain you may have had melted away... (HP fully restored.)
'''Take damage:''' You bathed your body in the light. A power shines within you, breaking through the darkness. The pain you had melted away... (HP fully restored.)
'''HP less than 30:''' For some reason, you punished yourself with the spores. The light relieves you... (HP fully restored.)

property.name: page
property.value: SAVE Point

property.name: description
property.value: Interact once with the 2nd eye and then once with the 3rd eye.

object.name: Dust Pile with Susie in it
